activities: Click2Mail receives electronic data sets from clients that are used to create and print postal mailpieces to be entered into the US Mail. These include names, addresses and other personal information that may be included by our clients at their discretion for inclusion into individual mailpieces. All data handling, printing and production activities are automated.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Client data and their prospect and customer name and address data to be used for automated creation of postal mail.
